>
[Sensitive Nose](/Feats.aspx?ID=5595) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kholo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=758" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 18 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your large black nose isn't just for show. You can pick up on the faintest scents near you and track them down. You gain [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) with a range of 30 feet.

**Special** You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain out of this feat or into this feat.
name: Sensitive Nose
